articles.author: Stephen Luntz
articles.title: We Now Know What Caused The Brightest Explosion Ever Seen In Space - IFLScience
articles.description: Dubbed the B.O.A.T. ("brightest of all time"), gamma ray burst GRB221009A was discovered by JWST in 2022. What caused it is unexpected.
articles.content: The gamma-ray burst GRB 221009A was so far off the charts for these events that we would only expect to see something this bright once every thousand years. Naturally, astronomers expected some pheno… [+5745 chars]

articles.description: His pioneering theoretical work helped us understand what made the universe possible
articles.content: The Nobel Prize-winning scientist Peter Higgss signature achievement was to solve a conundrum about what made the physical universe possible. Sixty years on, the pioneering theoretical work he and hi… [+4704 chars]
